2574.verse: وَٱلَّتِىٓ|And she who|105|112|11906$أَحْصَنَتْ|guarded|102|115|11907$فَرْجَهَا|her chastity,|105|118|11908$فَنَفَخْنَا|so We breathed|125|138|11909$فِيهَا|into her|71|84|253$مِن|of|50|63|53$رُّوحِنَا|Our Spirit,|87|94|11910$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا|and We made her|136|180|11911$وَٱبْنَهَآ|and her son|98|186|11912$ءَايَةً|a sign|60|148|2339$لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|for the worlds.|117|161|3107$

2576.verse: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ|But they cut off|127|137|11914$أَمْرَهُم|their affair|89|109|9289$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۖ|among themselves,|147|167|1056$كُلٌّ|all|49|69|1081$إِلَيْنَا|to Us|57|77|1234$رَٲجِعُونَ|(will) return.|104|114|464$

2577.verse: فَمَن|Then whoever|114|128|402$يَعْمَلْ|does|70|98|4433$مِنَ|[of]|50|78|156$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|[the] righteous deeds|164|192|239$وَهُوَ|while he|74|102|305$مُؤْمِنٌ|(is) a believer|111|125|4317$فَلَا|then not|77|105|208$كُفْرَانَ|(will be) rejected|133|188|11915$لِسَعْيِهِۦ|[of] his effort.|115|170|11916$وَإِنَّا|And indeed, We|124|180|682$لَهُۥ|of it|54|82|977$كَـٰتِبُونَ|(are) Recorders.|128|128|11917$

2578.verse: وَحَرَٲمٌ|And (there is) prohibition|185|194|11918$عَلَىٰ|upon|63|81|52$قَرْيَةٍ|a city|65|83|2319$أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ|which We have destroyed,|197|215|6246$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|101|461$لَا|not|42|51|30$يَرْجِعُونَ|will return.|105|105|3002$

2581.verse: إِنَّكُمْ|Indeed, you|99|110|514$وَمَا|and what|82|104|46$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship|99|121|1216$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah|143|165|2971$حَصَبُ|(are) firewood|114|136|11927$جَهَنَّمَ|(of) Hell.|78|89|2655$أَنتُمْ|You|54|172|796$لَهَا|to it|48|285|1226$وَٲرِدُونَ|will come.|99|218|11928$

2582.verse: لَوْ|If|41|47|905$كَانَ|were|57|69|913$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|these|82|94|335$ءَالِهَةً|gods,|72|84|5479$مَّا|not|42|54|262$وَرَدُوهَا‌ۖ|they (would) have come to it.|220|232|11929$وَكُلٌّ|And all|64|76|7324$فِيهَا|therein|66|72|253$خَـٰلِدُونَ|will abide forever.|137|137|257$

2584.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|76|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those|70|82|20$سَبَقَتْ|has gone forth|117|129|8064$لَهُم|for them|76|88|98$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|82|1169$ٱلْحُسْنَىٰٓ|the good,|95|107|4354$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|94|51$عَنْهَا|from it|63|69|380$مُبْعَدُونَ|(will be) removed far.|162|162|11930$

2574.verse: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.

2575.verse: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.

2576.verse: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.

2577.verse: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.

2578.verse: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return

2579.verse: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend

2580.verse: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."

2581.verse: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.

2582.verse: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.

2583.verse: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.

2584.verse: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
